name: Checkbox.Group
description: A control element that allows for multiple selections within a set.
description_zh: A control element that allows for multiple selections within a set.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultValue.description: The initial value of `value` when uncontrolled
defaultValue.description_zh: 不受控制时 'value' 的初始值

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is disabled
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则禁用复选框组

invalid.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is invalid
invalid.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则复选框组无效

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the checkbox group

name.description:
The name of the input fields in the checkbox group
(Useful for form submission).
name.description_zh:
复选框组中输入字段的名称
（用于表单提交）。

readOnly.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is read-only
readOnly.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则复选框组为只读
